data.message: Eminem bro, come on.. where's the 8 mile capsule?  Something autographed would be dope..  The CASIO G-SHOCK you did was SICK! The Majestic Athletic Detroit Tigers jerseys were bad ass, especially the monster tour ones.. Got a few of your action figures from both Art Asylum and Subway.. Can't get enough limited edition!!!  Wish ur Defiant Ones tee & poster combo had a signature... damn I'm so Stan lol

replies.message: Yeah I was hoping for an 8 mile capsule myself👍🏼Stans unite🙌🏼 i still bought this shit lol

Bro 8 mile capsule is coming
They announced it a couple weeks ago, around the anniversary of the movie time
#STANdUP 😂😂😂
